results.definition: a close affectionate and protective acceptance
examples: in the bosom of the family

results.definition: the locus of feelings and intuitions
examples: her story would melt your bosom

results.definition: either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman
hold (someone) tightly in your arms, usually with fondness
cloth that covers the chest or breasts
the chest considered as the place where secret thoughts are kept
examples: his bosom was bursting with the secret
